description.value: Most ghorans have bodies of pliable vines and tough stems, but you're covered in sturdy, rough bark and your legs are stable as roots. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your Fortitude or Reflex DC against attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip} you. This bonus also applies to saving throws against effects that would @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grab} you, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restrain} you, or knock you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Balance]{Balance}.
